statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT monitor_id, location, value FROM air_quality_data WHERE parameter = 'CO2';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM air_quality_data WHERE parameter = 'PM10' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE parameter = 'CO' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, parameter, value FROM air_quality_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT AVG(value), MAX(value), MIN(value) FROM air_quality_data WHERE monitor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location;
SELECT parameter, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY parameter HAVING AVG(value) > 30;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_monitoring;
SELECT id, location, pollutant, value, timestamp FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant='CO';
SELECT location, pollutant, value FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE location='New York' AND pollutant='PM2.5';
SELECT * FROM emission_limits WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant, limit FROM emission_limits WHERE pollutant='NO2';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant='NO2';
SELECT location, value FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, pollutant FROM air_quality_monitoring GROUP BY pollutant;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant, limit FROM emission_limits WHERE limit > 1000 ORDER BY limit ASC;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant, compliance_status FROM emission_limits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitoringStation;
SELECT station_name, location_info FROM AirQualityMonitoringStation ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM EmissionSources WHERE emission_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT record_id, source_id, date_recorded FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY date_recorded ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_id, MAX(pollutant_value) AS max_pollutant_value FROM ComplianceRecords GROUP BY source_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitoringStation;
SELECT station_name, location_info FROM AirQualityMonitoringStation ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM EmissionSources WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE pollutant_name = 'NO2' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM EmissionSources JOIN ComplianceRecords ON EmissionSources.source_id = ComplianceRecords.source_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitoring;
SELECT location, pollutant, concentration FROM AirQualityMonitoring WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility, pollutant, limit FROM EmissionLimits ORDER BY limit DESC;
SELECT id, record_date, compliance_status FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT location, capacity, technician FROM MonitoringStations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, pollutant, concentration FROM AirQualityMonitoring WHERE concentration > 50 ORDER BY concentration ASC;
SELECT facility, pollutant, limit FROM EmissionLimits WHERE limit < 100 ORDER BY facility;
SELECT facility, pollutant, compliance_status FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT location, capacity, technician FROM MonitoringStations WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations WHERE location='City Centre';
SELECT station_name, manager_name FROM monitoring_stations WHERE manager_name='John Smith';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_reports WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations INNER JOIN emission_limits ON monitoring_stations.station_id = emission_limits.pollutant_id WHERE max_limit > 50;

SELECT station_name, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM monitoring_stations INNER JOIN air_quality_reports ON monitoring_stations.station_id = air_quality_reports.station_id WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15' AND pollutant_level > 100 ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT station_name, manager_name, pollutant_name FROM monitoring_stations INNER JOIN pollutants ON monitoring_stations.station_id = pollutants.pollutant_id ORDER BY manager_name, station_name;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_compliance WHERE emission_limit < (SELECT MIN(min_limit) FROM emission_limits WHERE pollutant_id = 1);
